title: Mesa Verde National Park: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics              Visitation Statistics       The park is open every day of the year. The park occasionally has to close in the winter time due to snow storms. The busiest months of the year are July and August. The second week in August is traditionally the busiest week of the entire year with as many as 3,000 people a day entering the park. Some of the slowest winter days will see less than 50 people in the park.
